name: taskpublisher
description: Publish custom Azure DevOps pipeline task using managed service endpoint
helpMarkDown: For aditional information and support please refer to <https://github.com/dmitryserbin/azdev-task-publisher> project repository.
author: Dmitry Serbin

inputs.name: EndpointType
inputs.label: Azure DevOps endpoint type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select endpoint type to connect Azure DevOps: 
Service = user-defined personal access token (PAT) service endpoint 

Note: requires 'Extensions' and 'Agent Pools' read & manage permissions; 
Integrated = default 'SystemVssConnection' service endpoint for 'Project Collection Build Service' user account.

inputs.name: ConnectedService
inputs.label: Service endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select service endpoint for Azure DevOps account

inputs.name: Replace
inputs.label: Replace existing task
inputs.helpMarkDown: Remove existing task entirely before publishing new version

inputs.name: Patch
inputs.label: Update patch version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update task patch version with current build or release ID (use Release.ReleaseId or Build.BuildId variable)

inputs.name: Preview
inputs.label: Publish preview version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publish preview version of the task

inputs.name: ArtifactsPath
inputs.label: Path to artifacts directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify path to directory containing task artifacts
